body.p: The 2006 Discussion Paper and the 2008 Exposure Draft proposed identifying a group of primary users of financial reports. Some respondents to the 2008 Exposure Draft said that other users who have not provided, and are not considering providing, resources to the entity, use financial reports for a variety of reasons. The Board sympathised with their information needs but concluded that without a defined group of primary users, the Conceptual Framework would risk becoming unduly abstract or vague.
